title: W3.CSS Fashion Colors

metadata.description: Learn about W3.CSS Fashion Colors with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
How to Use Fashion Colors Fashion Colors are easy to use. Just add a link to the right color library: Then, add a class name to the HTML element you want to color: Example
Brandied Melon
Winterberry
Crocus
Download the CSS » Color of the Year 2025 Mocha Mousse The fashion colors are selected from Colors of the Year . Spring / Summer Colors 2025 Bran Crocus Lime Cream Limpet Shell White Grape Déja Vu Blue Kashmir Misted Marigold Orangeade Cocoon Seasonless Shades Spring 2025 Eclipse Antique White Rum Rasin Moonbeam Blue Granite Autumn / Winter Colors 2025 Lemon Grass Brandied Melon Lyons Blue Damson Primrose Pink Winterberry Hot Chocolate Chili Oil Poppy Red Bronze Brown Seasonless Shades Autumn 2025 Bright White French Roast Vapor Blue Crown Blue Mauve Wine Color of the Year 2024 Peach Fuzz The fashion colors are selected from Colors of the Year . Example
Peach Fuzz
Watercress
Orangeade

summary: This tutorial covers W3.CSS Fashion Colors concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use W3.CSS Fashion Colors effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of W3.CSS Fashion Colors and how to apply it in your projects.
